sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>x_anbib_grc.GRCImportEntityHelper</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>GRCImportEntityHelper</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var GRCImportEntityHelper = Class.create();
GRCImportEntityHelper.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },
	
	separateFields: function(data){
		var obj = {};
		var fieldList = ["service_service_name", "parent_service", "supplier_service_name", "short_description", "service_record_type", "service_owner_name", "status_ghq", "status_eur", "status_afr", "1yp_status_apc", "status_maz", "status_naz", "status_saz", "user_base_ghq", "user_base_eur", "user_base_afr", "user_base_apc", "user_base_maz", "user_base_naz", "user_base_saz", "long_description", "zone", "managed_by", "business_function", "business_subfunction", "core_functionality", "country_scope", "department", "link_to_sharepoint", "hosting_location_legal_requirement", "application_technology_family", "application_version", "level_of_customization", "application_type", "client_type", "rto", "rpo", "network_segmentation", "high_availability", "min_bandwidth", "network_traffic", "hosting_type", "max_latency", "cloud_strategy", "distribution_platform", "database", "operating_system", "web_urls", "browser_compatability", "backup_frequency", "encryption", "os_compatibility_client", "os_compatibility_server", "technical_fit", "authentication", "device_management", "cmdblink", "firewall_traffic", "disaster_recovery", "crown_jewel", "personal_data", "criticality", "financial_reporting_relevant", "external_facing", "sod_auto_validation", "privacy_impact_assessment", "data_sensitivity", "mics_relevance", "end_game", "time", "pace_layer", "sanctioned", "decommissioning_strategy", "decommissionmigration_saving_estimate", "1yp_status", "date_live", "archive_date", "archiving_duration_months", "decommissioning_date", "to_be_decommissioned_with", "data_retention_period", "sla_sev1", "sla_sev2", "sla_sev3", "sla_sev4", "sla_service_request", "end_of_life_app", "end_of_life_os_db", "contract_cluster", "software_support_end_date", "critical_period", "ticket_volume", "incident_volume", "vendor_degree_of_satisfaction"];
		
		fieldList.forEach(function(field){
			if(!!data[field]){
				obj[field] = data[field];
			}
		});
		
		return obj;
	},

    type: 'GRCImportEntityHelper'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
